item.title: Hucclecote Os Royal Oak broken glass, 26th November
item.description:
Shelter at HUCCLECOTE o/s Royal Oak Pane of glass smashed. Needs tidy then repair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester

item.title: Broken glass pane Barnwood after Church Lane, 26th November
item.description:
Bus shelter BARNWOOD after Church Lane Glass pane smashed. Needs glass removing and subsequently repaired
